quessë is a noun meaning "feather" in Qu: Image:Quesse.gifQuessë is also the name in Quenya of the fourth letter of the Tengwar alphabet.  It is the fourth letter of the first grade or Tyellë
Note: which contains "voiceless stops" and it is the first letter in the fourth series of consonants.  For written Quenya or Sindarin
The names of the letters: the fourth series is used for the labialized k or kw-series
column5: and Quessë represents KW (which may be transcribed in English as QU).  In Westron the fourth series is used for the k-series
column7: and this letter K or "hard" C.  The Westron name for this letter is Cá.See Westron Tengwar

quessë is a noun meaning "feather" in Qu: The word derives from the Primitive Quendian Sundocarme KWES.
